page.title: 02LOCAL ATTITUDES.
page.content: The local people wanted to get rid of the factories and Chemical Works and to introduce more countryside into their town . The men wanted more work and the women more entertainment . Warrington was the favorite shopping centre because it had a large variety of shops that were easy to reach . The locals were happy living in the area but not with the amenities around them . Three of the locals complained about the bad smells coming from the LA PORTE Chemical Works and the poor traffic conditions along Moorfield Road .Barrows Green is a tidy area surrounded by fields and hedgerows , the people are friendly and easy going but two of the people we interviewed got quite angry when complaining about the poor facilities for the young .
